# textarea
## textarea

### Example

```javascript
{
  "type": "textarea",
  "key": "bio",
  "templateOptions": {
    "label": "Biography",
    "theme": "custom",
    "rows": 5
  }
}
```

#### Configuration

#### templateOptions.label _: string_

#### templateOptions.theme _: string_

#### templateOptions.rows _: integer_

Number of rows
